text: #8778 was fixed with a really helpful patch, but a small bug(?) in Block.java does not fix #8778 to always work as expected. Please review this patch and apply if correct.

creator: tagunov@motor.ru
tagunov@motor.ru
text:
Bug #8778 is fixed.
A loop terminator has been built into Block#layout.
However it looks like line terminator fails on some input files - sample provided.
The proposed patch fixes the problem.

Please review and apply if appropriate.

creator: pascal.sancho@takoma.fr
text: Fixed in FOP 0.94 and probably earlier versions

creator: gadams@apache.org
